策.definition: policy; plan; scheme; bamboo slip for writing (old); to whip (a horse); to encourage; riding crop with sharp spines (old); essay written for the imperial examinations (old); upward horizontal stroke in calligraphy

策劃.definition: to plot; to scheme; to bring about; to engineer; planning; producer; planner

策勒.definition: Chira County in Hotan Prefecture 和田地區|和田地区[He2 tian2 Di4 qu1], Xinjiang

策勒縣.definition: Chira County in Hotan Prefecture 和田地區|和田地区[He2 tian2 Di4 qu1], Xinjiang

策動.definition: to conspire; to plot (a rebellion, crime etc); to machinate; to spur on; to urge action

策勵.definition: to encourage; to urge; to impel; to spur sb on

策反.definition: to instigate (rebellion etc); incitement (e.g. to desertion within opposing camp)

策問.definition: essay on policy in question and answer form used in imperial exams

策源地.definition: place of origin; source (of a war or a social movement)

策畫.definition: variant of 策劃|策划[ce4 hua4]

策試.definition: imperial exam involving writing essay on policy 策論|策论[ce4 lun4]

策論.definition: essay on current affairs submitted to the emperor as policy advice (old)

策馬.definition: to urge on a horse using a whip or spurs
